text: Peltospira smaragdina is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Peltospiridae. ==Distribution== == Description == The maximum recorded shell length is 12 mm.Welch J. J. (2010). "The "Island Rule" and Deep-Sea Gastropods: Re-Examining the Evidence". PLOS One 5(1): e8776. doi:10.1371/journal.pone.0008776. == Habitat == Minimum recorded depth is 870 m. Maximum recorded depth is 3520 m. ==References== ==External links== Category:Peltospiridae Category:Gastropods described in 2001
title: Peltospira smaragdina
